website_summaries.verdict: Exceptional value for an extremely sturdy table. Simple in design and will complement most decors. Available in many color options.
pros: An extremely affordable choice that looks great, too
The handy bottom shelf adds extra storage options
Easy to assemble, with all the necessary tools provided
cons: Some users report discoloration in areas

customer_reviews.title: EVERYTHING I NEEDED & MORE!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a cheap, sturdy, yet luxury style coffee table like this for AGES. The reviews made me a bit hesitant but I even ordered one that was “like new” with damage to the box and the table came PERFECT! The shipping was actually very secure. It doesn’t look cheap like my last one, and it has all the storage I need. I don’t see it chipping or staining at all. (Which is why I was worried about the white). Quick and easy to build. But seriously, look no further, this coffee table is the best on the market for this price!!!! So in love!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and size
customer_reviews.text: Assembly directions are easy to follow but I despise the connecting screws used in this product. Most have an easy locking screw, this product uses a slip bolt that must line up to the hole the connecting screw feeds into. It’s a lot of feeling and hit or miss. At one point I was unable to get one screw in only to find out the thread was defective and would screw into any of the adjoining slip bolts. I had to improvise and use a regular screw and drill my own hole. But over all this table is sturdy and looks good in my space. It’s the perfect size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: After months looking for white coffee table i decided to finally order this one. I'm glad I did. It was a great choice. Matched my living room decor perfectly. Very easy to put together all parts were labeled with numbers. The only downfall was the delivery of the product. I purposely ordered this to be sent to my door,but instead I had to pick it up from the post office which was a hassle. Wasn't sure if post office or amazon played a role in that. Besides that, its a nice coffee table and recieved many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Bao

customer_reviews.title: Came with chips and scratches, but not a bad table
customer_reviews.text: The one we received was already scratched up and dented. Luckily I had a furniture pen that was a similar color from a previous purchase and it covered everything ok. Otherwise, it was exactly as described and is a decent table for the money. Took my husband about an hour to put it together which was a bit of a pain for something that I feel like should have been very simple. It did ship and arrive very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Sadly
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we opened it we saw one arm already cracked. We loved it so much we thought we would just keep it and build it. As you can see it could not hold up and spilt more damaged. We hope it can handle itself but we would love it and change our review if you can send us a better one 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: msed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, strong, beautiful, but....2 imperfections
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have given 5 stars. The table is beautiful and sturdy. BUT there were 2 imperfections on the table right on the Wood part top of the coffee table. For the amount of money spent, I was upset at the fact that there were imperfections on the tables. However, I still liked the table. It’s strong, sturdy, elegant. I chose the driftwood top and the white bottom and it’s very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Cassy

customer_reviews.title: Not as tall as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been without a coffee table for a while now and finally decided to order one since I couldn't find one I liked in person. I hate shopping for furniture online because I like to visually see something in regards to how tall and so forth. This is a cute table but not as tall as I had hoped. It needed to be a little taller in my opinion but it does the job so I can't complain too much. Good piece for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Trina O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Very nice coffee table for the living room!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my new coffee table! We used to have a circular glass table in the living room that took up a lot of space, but having this nice, rectangular table makes the room seem so much bigger! I saw some reviews of receiving some damages pieces of the table but ours was delivered in perfect condition. I got the sea foam green colour because our entire home is beach themed and it’s just a perfect addition!
customer_reviews.author: angel williams

customer_reviews.title: Damage on arrival
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: do not buy! We cleaned it with a soft towel and it scratched the entire surface of the table! It looks terrible now. We can’t believe something that soft would cause so many scratches and never had an issue with any other surface Although this table is very cute, easy to put together, and sturdy, it came with quite a few nicks and scratches. I don’t expect that with something brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this along with the console table that matches the same style and I absolutely love it! I was worried with all the reviews saying that it is small but for our living room its great. If you have a huge living room then it would probably look too small though. Packaging was great, and instructions were simple enough. As far as assembly I cannot say, because my boyfriend decided he wanted to build something that day (hey, fine by me)! Product wasn't scratched or anything, I recommend to anyone who wants something nice but not trying to break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Samkinks

customer_reviews.title: Damaged!
customer_reviews.text: A few corners damaged. I wish I had a truck so I could drop it off to be returned. I kept it and I'll make it work but I'm not happy. Love the style, its pretty. Just wish it didn't already look so worn. I added a couple pics so you could see the extent to which its damaged. There are a total of four corners that look this way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table excellent customer support
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for the price! I got the red and the color is excellent. When the package arrive the top was damaged so I contacted customer support and they sent a new one out immediately. It arrived so fast I didn’t think that could possibly be what it was! So yes. Love the table! And excellent customer support from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Blue

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, not scratch resistant
customer_reviews.text: Like the matching end table, it is sturdy and easy to put together but also like the end table, I'm docking it a star is that it is EXTREMELY easy to scratch.We've scratched it with a tv remote, dinner plate, and a plant pot already within 3 days of having it. Make sure you put feet onto the bottom of any pots and if you eat in the living room, use pot holders.
customer_reviews.author: Troi

customer_reviews.title: Easy and classy!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together! It looks classy and it's pretty sturdy. It's the perfect size for my living room. However, it does scratch easily so be careful putting it together. Overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Pieces did not fit together
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward towards this product but it had broken upon opening. This product scratches easily. One of the pieces broke meaning either it's fragile or just mishandled and it's the typical cheap wood. I was still excited to build this furniture that I got a replacement. To get to the most the pieces did not fit together. Time and money was wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Table
customer_reviews.text: Table is beautiful! Fits in with my Farm House concept. Only complaint, which isn't a real complaint about the table, is that it is white and we have 3 dogs I did not think about that upon purchasing. It has to be wiped down daily but that's on me. I put it together by myself in 30 minutes without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: 3rd times a charm
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 1st coffee table and had to return because of damage. So proceeded to get another and surprisingly it was damaged as well. Bought the end table which was nice and all but now I have no matching table. Disappointed. UPDATED REVIEW: Decided on trying ordering a third time... glad I did. Table is nice and slightly heavy. Very clean looking. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great value, cute table.
customer_reviews.text: The box did come a little damaged but luckily the styrofoam completely protected the parts. This table is very nice looking and was very easy to assemble. I am horrible at putting things together, but I did it by myself and did it pretty quickly which I was pleasantly surprised about. It's not super fancy and I chose not to put the little white stickers over the screws, at least for now. I think it still looks very nice. Great value for the money and so glad I bought it! Looks wonderful with the matching tv stand.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it you're just wasting your money
customer_reviews.text: This product was received in a carton that was fully intact. However when I open the carton and remove the contents I was very disappointed. The top wood veneer with scratched and stained. The metal legs for scratched to the bare metal. After assembling it the stability was average at best. I bought it for the purpose of using it as a coffee table. Due to the poor quality I did not use it as a coffee table and now it just sits in my garage I would never recommend that product to anyone that is a friend. I strongly suggest that anyone considering this save your money it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Fiorino

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS TERRIBLE DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Hi, Just wanted to save you good folks out there from my mistake. I thought this might be similar to an IKEA table when I purchased it a few months ago, and I was wrong. My husband took it out of the box last night and right away our entire first floor smelled from the chemicals off gasing from this thing. Also, aside from the terrible smell (it will make you feel sick) the particle board split apart when it was assembled. Rendering it smelly and useless. The company is not helping resolve this issue either. Long story short, do not waste your money on this like I did!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used and it was in perfectly good condition. Only issue was that there was so much styrofoam in the box when that really was not necessary, so wasteful. It was also ripped up and in crumbles so when I opened the box it got EVERYWHERE. Ignoring that, it's good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Scheets

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I like the color of this product and that it was relatively easy to assemble. However, I have two terrors that I call dogs that run into everything. I’ve had this coffee table less than a year and it’s already super wobbly and coming apart
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: Great table & Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the table. Some minor hiccups with assembly but all came together in the end. The color is lovely and works well with the rest of the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: One Wisemind

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken pieces in a damaged box
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with broken bits, PLENTY of cosmetic damage, and the shipping box was ripped. It feels wobbly and cheap. Certainly not worth the money and too hard to return.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee table. One corner had a tiny chip but nothing that bothered us. It’s sturdy and durable. Love that there’s plenty of storage underneath it. Easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Kiljets

customer_reviews.title: Like IKEA
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks. Assembly isn’t as easy as what others in here make it seem—at least for a single girl trying to put it together herself (which is one of the reasons why I chose this!!). The instructions are equivalent to Ikea’s as well as the quality. Save your money and time!! *Update*.. I was refunded $50.. I paid $75.. thanks Amazon for this crap product and partial refund!
customer_reviews.author: K.Mar

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase, I had some trouble putting it together but with my boyfriends help it was super easy. Looks great in our living room and looks more expensive than it actually was. I will be purchasing side tables next to match.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Keeling

customer_reviews.title: Well built and better than expected.  Great large format printer stand.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a stand for a Canon Pixma Pro-100 and this fit the bill perfect. Sturdy construction with lots of screw reinforcements to prevent wobbling. Well packaged and zero damage upon delivery. Instructions are well written and pictures are accurate. Took about 20 minutes to assemble with a Phillips-Head screwdriver needed only.
customer_reviews.author: Amused

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a prefab
customer_reviews.text: As far as kit furniture goes, it has a high end look. But the glossy finish is a nightmare when it comes to fingerprints and dust. Needs attention daily.
customer_reviews.author: CosmicHam

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be "aired" out before moveing into home!
customer_reviews.text: This product comes with a STRONG UNDESIRABLE SMELL! Smells somewhat chemical in nature...I had to leave it outside in the wind to air out, for days before I could even place it into my home...seems okay now....but what a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coffee table! The color is vibrant and adds a lot of charm to any living room. Was very easy to assemble. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shuchi

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The quality is less than expected. It arrived with many pieces scratched (including the top) and is poorly machined, where the stand doesn't square off and instead sits at off-angles.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, cute table, but damaged :(
customer_reviews.text: Color is solid gray, seems sturdy, pretty easy to assemble and the size is good- not small at all.. but the corner of the table top was damaged. Contacted the seller for a replacement table top, awaiting a response.
customer_reviews.author: Kats01

customer_reviews.title: Love the table!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this table! It looks sleek, sturdy, and a great size! The only thing I don’t like about it is that it has a funky smell from being in the plastic (I’m assuming). When it was first put together, it was an overwhelming chemical smell. I wiped it all down with cleaner and it has diluted the smell but even asfter 3 days I can still smell it a bit in the house. It’s nothing terrible because I know it’ll go away but seeing it’s winter, it’s hard to air out the house so it’s just a little annoying. Still love it for its price though!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Convenience concepts oxford coffee table
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is pretty sturdy and looks really nice but its not made of real wood its more of a pressed composite type material which speaking from past experience it swells when wet and bows with heavy objects.
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah Markley

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This table exceeded my expectations honestly!!! Like the wood is so much better and heavier than I expected! Great quality! I was going for a more simple and modern look but still wanted great quality and this table did just that!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Siafah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, color is true to the picture and very solid material. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars i is that the finish is really fragile, it dings easy, but I just coated it with polyurethane and it's fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Gdsgrl

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: This table was nice but mine came with a busted corner and I walked in the house today and the smell hit me. It was a metallic and fishy smell. Ugh. Now idk what to do with it since it’s put together
customer_reviews.author: Natalye P

customer_reviews.title: Dents and messed up corners
customer_reviews.text: Really upset. When we assembled the table the top had a lot of dents and messed up spots. Check your corners before you brake up the styrofoam... not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I shouldn’t have expected much for the price, but it looks and feels cheap up close. However if you’re 10ft away, it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: seth sawyer

customer_reviews.title: This decor beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy, the size is perfect and the color is beautiful being a soft seafoam. It is perfect on our home on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice Table
customer_reviews.text: I got this table to my living room and Im in love. The color is exactly as depicted. The demotions are true to size. Only complaint I had was the assembly. I was missing a knob that goes on the bottom. Without the knob the table is rather wobbly but that can easily be fixed with those rubber pieces placed on chairs to stop them from straching the floor.
customer_reviews.author: cadieja brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice & inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: I was ok with this purchase. The table looks nice and I was looking for tables that weren’t expensive. They were easy to put together however, the gave you stick on paper to cover the screws. Not a luzurious purchase but they look nice in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Marko

customer_reviews.title: Cute but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Super cute table, however, I was honestly so disappointed when we finished putting it together. It turned out to be super small... almost resembles a bench. Would probably fit better in a studio. Definitely will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Y

customer_reviews.title: No directions
customer_reviews.text: Just got my table and it came with no directions Update.. amazon sent me a replacement table in order to get directions and I was able to build my table. I like, my only con is that is very fragile. I always move the table out of the way to workout, and I broke one of the size while pulling it.. for the price I expect better quality.
customer_reviews.author: karoline

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking!!!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This product looks like it could fall apart at any money, it’s so frail looking. Arrived without any damage and with all parts.
customer_reviews.author: esslinj

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Looks good overall. It comes with gray stickers to put over screw holes. The stickers look a little cheesy. Wish that they had put the screws in other locations
customer_reviews.author: E. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Lovely table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table. It was easy to assemble (my teenage daughter out it together). And it's very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: D Marks

customer_reviews.title: 0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this twice. First time product was damaged. Fave it a second chance and the product was STILL damaged when they replaced it. Don’t waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: blessing.belle.blog

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, hard to put together with not well explained intructions
customer_reviews.text: Instructions weren’t very clear. Putting the top on was far from easy. Caused me to scratch the paint, so there’s marks on the table. Also a chip in the corner, not sure if it was there before. Styrofoam that came in the box was all over the place, but oh well I guess. Overall it’s a beautiful table, looks farmhouse. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easy as well
customer_reviews.text: For your money, you can't beat this! It looks so cute, it's a lot sturdier then I expected. Cleans easy as well, and overall wasn't too difficult to put together. My only complaint is how the screws show on the sides, and they only provide you with these white stickers that are bigger then the screw and make it look tacky, so I just left them exposed. That's my reasoning for 4/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, pretty table
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the easiest piece of furniture that I have ever assembled. It looks really nice and it was a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn E O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Love the color but its really just IKEA like quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the color but its really just IKEA like quality...not what I was expecting but the unique color makes up for it. Can't complain too much, it was fairly inexpensive and I have no doubts after a year or two, it'll need to be scrapped
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for the price. However, the sides holes are meant to be covered with CHEAP stickers!! We decided not to even cover them, because it looked tacky with them. If it hadn’t been for that, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Torres

customer_reviews.title: Nice but product had some problems.
customer_reviews.text: I like the table but when I opened the box there were dings on the edges of a few sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real wood, cheap
customer_reviews.text: My table arrived chipped and the material is a cheap cork rather than real wood.
customer_reviews.author: Hendrix 🍃✨

customer_reviews.title: Love the yellow!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright color, but the stickers I had to add to hide the screws are very noticeable. It was easy to put together and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture
customer_reviews.text: For fake wood furniture, it is not that heavy to move around. Very sturdy, easy to put together. I love this product line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The color looks good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this confutable for my new apartment, it fits very well, the light blue looks very good, it is sturdy and heavy. there is 2 layers which is very helpful for put some stuffs on it. we like it
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT, it matches my t v stand perfectly, was easy to put together. LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Ericac73

customer_reviews.title: Came cracked
customer_reviews.text: Mine had a board cracked but we were still able to put it together. Paint chipped very easily. Not very durable. Seller does not respond to emails about concerns or issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Michaella

customer_reviews.title: It's navy
customer_reviews.text: Darker than the beautiful blue that is shown. More like navy blue.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Simple look
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few months and it’s holding up well. Don’t let anyone put too much weight on it. It looks nice, the lower shelf is so helpful for tucking away items.
customer_reviews.author: kerzi12

customer_reviews.title: Totally love this table glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this table made perfect nothing wrong with it I will be ordering other things from the seller it is a must buy
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Junk...can I give it less than one star?
customer_reviews.text: This is absolute garbage, probably worth 25 bucks. Pieces were missing, the assembly instructions did not match the piece. Pieces were damaged. Holes were drilled in wrong places and some were too small. I spent an hour playing wood shop to assemble it. Do yourself a favor and get some 2x4’s, two milk crates and a can of white spray paint. You’d be happier with the finished result.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Just a tad difficult to assemble but worth it. Very cute and sturdy. Perfect touch to my farmhouse living room
customer_reviews.author: E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful end table
customer_reviews.text: Love my end table. It matches my coffee table perfect. Good looks and storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Voegtlin

customer_reviews.title: Not very great...
customer_reviews.text: Table assembly took around 30 mins and was fairly straight forward. The table however is very unstable and poorly made. The color on the table top begins to fade over time and the color comes off when you use any type of cleaning product on it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoya

customer_reviews.title: Nice coffee table and good customer service
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and looks great. There was a small defect on the top and the company, "Convenience Concepts" was easy to reach and sent out a replacement top very quickly. The table is of good quality. I am happy this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Table!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this coffee table . It was reasonably priced, and really stylish! It took about 1 hour to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in the process of furnishing my apartment. This piece was so easy to assemble( took me 30 min on my own) and looks so gorgeous. The blue is true to color and I'm so happy I went with it! Over all very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy at all and I received it with a huge scratch and dent on it. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee table! It’s heavy but not super heavy. Didn’t take to long to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Basic assembly required looks good inexpensive but it doesn’t look cheap and it is fairly heavy
customer_reviews.author: tommy wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got the coffee table today and put it together by myself in about 30 minutes. I was kind of wishing I hadn't ordered it after reading the reviews, but I am very pleased with the quality and ease of assembling. I can't wait to get the sofa table and end tables.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: I love this little table. Must be super easy to put together because my bf put it together on his own and it didn't take him long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jakkstakks

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute and easy-to-assemble coffee table! Perfect size and very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Nemetz

customer_reviews.title: Great color, could be sturdier
customer_reviews.text: The color is a true gray and goes well in our room. I wish it came a bit more sturdy, but my Husband fixed that with a few extra bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice table!
customer_reviews.text: We are impressed with this coffee table. It is was easy to put together and looks nice! We also got the matching end tables to go with it. Very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value buy
customer_reviews.text: Using in a man cave and serves its purpose for the price. I didn’t want anything too fancy that i would pay a considerable amount of money for. Much more sturdy than i expected and easy to assemble. Only downside is it seems to scratch easy but you can barley see it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged but from one end Upset looks like the threw the box around and it cause it to crack!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. The only concern I have is that when you insert the small wooden wedges to hold the pieces together before tightening them with the wood screws, the wedges caused the wood pieces to crack around the holes where the wedges go.
customer_reviews.author: Viddystyle

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: It's super small. This is more for a college dorm. But cute and easy to put together. It's just super small for a livingroom.
customer_reviews.author: alexis maddox

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: This product was pretty easy to put together, and looks exactly as described, however it is not at ALL scratch resistant. It already came with some scratches and it’s only gotten worse in the past month since I’ve had it. (Not using it for anything rough, just every little movement on the surface causes a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Doody

customer_reviews.title: Particle board and junk
customer_reviews.text: This item is junk. Particle board and screws strip easily.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: We love the table and it was worth what we paid for but it came damaged with some corners banged up and some parts scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Estrella

customer_reviews.title: coffee table
customer_reviews.text: The table has a small defect on one corner but I decided to keep it anyway. It didn't appear to happen in shipping as the packaging was good. It works ok for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: P. L.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! It stands up to my son using it as a balancing tool to walk, banging all of his cups and toys on it and it has not yet scratched. It was a little difficult to put together but that is because we are amateurs so it should take a normal person about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Creal

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a yellow coffee table and I received it today with none of the screws to put it together!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Lopez

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...lesson learned.
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with this purchase until I noticed some scratch marks on the top of the table. Reading other reviews it seems this is very common. Will be contacting the company for a replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: LEEANN LOZON

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Liked this so much I purchased two of the matching end tables. No odors or residue here. End result was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: S Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee table
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the box I assumed it was going to be flimsy & too small. It’s actually the perfect size & very good material! It’s not flimsy at all. I would definitely buy more furniture from this company.
customer_reviews.author: ShaeknBake

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Perfect cappuccino color
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Perfect cappuccino color! Perfect size I was expecting. Measurements given were precise! Husband just said this was a pain to put together but still had it done in 30 mins 😆
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great cocktail table
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time with no damages. I put cocktail table together myself and it was a little tricky but delighted with finished product. Nice rich color. Lot of storage space and looks great in living room with matching end table
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great value and Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The table is a good value. When it arrived the delivery man dropped it on my porch, damaging a corner of the table top. The company sent a new table top free of charge. Very easy and very fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is not the color looks like black not expresso
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it the color is not espresso. I didn't even put together because the color is not as described They are giving so much trouble for the refund that I don't recommend to buy this
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this coffee table, pretty sturdy, even tho I added wood glue to all of the seams...I love the storage shelf and can't wait to find just the right items to decorate this table
customer_reviews.author: Mail Lady D

customer_reviews.title: Wood cracked during assembly
customer_reviews.text: Super delicate / cheap wood. Cracked during assembly. I don’t like how chunky the table looks. Not easy to put together either! (I’m spoiled by Allen wrenches... this one requires an actual screwdriver and so many different pieces)
customer_reviews.author: Saf

customer_reviews.title: Get Something Better
customer_reviews.text: Garbage, this is all MDF fake wood with a strong chemical smell. There are better options, all real wood options. This is a waste of time and money. .
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Dixon

customer_reviews.title: It is ok not so good
customer_reviews.text: I got this table for my living room. The paint easily chips off and within a month or two of getting it had a lot of scratches on the top. Very visible scratches which is not pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Alba

product_meta.title: Convenience Concepts Oxford Coffee Table, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Oxford Coffee Table by Convenience Concepts is a great addition to any home. In a rich glossy black finish it's sure to complement any home decor. Featuring a bottom shelf that provides plenty of space to display collectibles or every day necessities with ease of access. Coordinating pieces are also available, sold seperately.
feature_bullets: 39.5 (L) x 21.75 (W) x 17.75 (H) inches x Weight: 34 lbs.
